snippet: "Go On," which stars Matthew Perry as a sports talk radio host, and "Animal Practice," which stars Justin Kirk and co-stars a monkey, will be shown commercial free during expected high points of the games.
abstract: "Go On," which stars Matthew Perry as a sports talk radio host, and "Animal Practice," which stars Justin Kirk and co-stars a monkey, will be shown commercial free during expected high points of the games.

headline.main: NBC Hopes Olympics Can Help New Comedies
